text: Ansiba Hassan is a Malayalam actress , television anchor and dancer. Her first role was in the 2013 Tamil film Paranjothi, directed by Gobu Balaji. Her popularity grew as a result of her appearance in Jeethu Joseph's 2013 hit Malayalam movie Drishyam where she played the part of Anju, the daughter of an ordinary cable TV operator. == Early life == Ansiba was born 18 June 1992, the eldest of six children born to parents nissar and Rasiya in the Calicut district of Kerala, India. Her father is a photographer and her mother is a housewife. She has 3 younger brothers Ashik, Asib, Afsal and a younger sister Afsana.http://www.mangalam.com/mangalam-varika/153219?page=0,0 She completed her graduation in BSc Visual Communication. ==Filmography == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" ! scope="col" | Film ! scope="col" | Year ! scope="col" | Language ! scope="col" | Role ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | Notes |- ! scope="row" | Allu and Arjun |2021 | Malayalam | | Directorial debut Feature film |- ! scope="row" | Drishyam 2 |2021 | Malayalam | Anju George, elder daughter of Georgekutty. |Filming |- ! scope="row" | Badarul Muneer Husnul Jamal | | Malayalam | Sulekha | |- ! scope="row" | Pennoruthi |2019 |Malayalam |Gouri | |- ! scope="row" | A Live Story |2018 |Malayalam | |As Director & Wrtier Short film |- ! scope="row" | Zebra varakal |2017 |Malayalam |Mary Cherian | |- ! scope="row" | Indulekha |2017 |Malayalam |Indulekha | |- ! scope="row" | Paarkanum Pola Irukku |2017 |Tamil |Maheswari | |- ! scope="row" | Pareeth Pandari |2017 |Malayalam | Fazeela Pareeth | |- ! scope="row"|Kattappanayile Rithwik Roshan |2016 |Malayalam |Actress |Guest appearance |- ! scope="row" | Appuram Bengal Ippuram Thiruvithamkoor | 2016 | Malayalam | Beevathu | |- ! scope="row" | Siva Siva | 2016 | Tamil | -- | |- ! scope="row" | John Honayi | 2015 | Malayalam | Maria | |- ! scope="row" | Uthara Chemmeen | 2015 | Malayalam | Neelipennu | |- ! scope="row" | Vishwasam...
